是鹅肝酱(terrine)还是煎鹅肝(pan-fry)。鹅肝是一道美味，做法也随着烹饪潮流而不断变化。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent. (denoting a tureen): from French, literally large earthenware pot', from terrin 'earthen'. Compare with tureen
